statements: SELECT * FROM prescription_drug_usage ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT drug_name, price FROM prescription_drug_usage WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT pharmacy_id, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM prescription_drug_usage GROUP BY pharmacy_id;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name, pharmacy_id FROM prescription_drug_usage WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT transaction_id, patient_id, price * quantity AS total_cost FROM prescription_drug_usage ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM prescription_drug_usage ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT drug_name, quantity, price FROM prescription_drug_usage WHERE patient_id = '45e0819c-4e27-4f70-9d67-1f31ea889c51';
SELECT transaction_id, drug_name, transaction_date FROM prescription_drug_usage WHERE pharmacy_id = '8728eb1f-f858-49e7-aeed-58967730658f' AND quantity > 5 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM prescription_drug_usage WHERE drug_name LIKE '%aspirin%' OR drug_name LIKE '%ibuprofen%';
SELECT patient_id, SUM(quantity*price) AS total_spent FROM prescription_drug_usage GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM prescription_transactions;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, prescribed_amount FROM prescription_transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT drug_name, patient_id, transaction_date FROM prescription_transactions WHERE patient_id = 1001 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, drug_name, prescribed_amount, transaction_date FROM prescription_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_records WHERE block_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM prescription_transactions WHERE patient_id = 12345 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, SUM(prescribed_amount) AS total_amount FROM prescription_transactions GROUP BY drug_name;
SELECT * FROM prescription_transactions WHERE drug_name LIKE 'Aspirin%' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM prescription_transactions GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT pt.patient_id, pt.drug_name, bt.block_hash, bt.block_timestamp FROM prescription_transactions pt INNER JOIN blockchain_records bt ON pt.transaction_id = bt.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM PrescriptionTransactions;
SELECT transaction_id, patient_id, drug_name, quantity, transaction_date FROM PrescriptionTransactions;
SELECT drug_name, patient_id, quantity, transaction_date, transaction_id FROM PrescriptionTransactions;
SELECT transaction_id, patient_id, drug_name, quantity, transaction_date FROM PrescriptionTransactions WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT drug_name, quantity, transaction_date, patient_id FROM PrescriptionTransactions WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM PrescriptionTransactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, drug_name, quantity FROM PrescriptionTransactions WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT block_id, transaction_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM BlockchainTransactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, quantity FROM PrescriptionTransactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PrescriptionHistory WHERE drug_name LIKE '%pain%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM prescription_drugs;
SELECT drug_name, drug_cost FROM prescription_drugs ORDER BY drug_cost DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM drug_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT block_id, block_hash, block_timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY block_timestamp ASC;
SELECT drug_name, drug_cost FROM prescription_drugs;
SELECT * FROM drug_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT drug_name, drug_cost FROM prescription_drugs WHERE drug_cost > 100.00 ORDER BY drug_cost DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_email ASC;

SELECT drug_name, transaction_date FROM prescription_drugs JOIN drug_transactions ON prescription_drugs.drug_id = drug_transactions.drug_id WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, drug_name, prescribed_date, dosage FROM drug_prescriptions;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies;
SELECT patient_name, address, contact_number FROM patients;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, pharmacy_id, quantity FROM drug_transactions;
SELECT block_id, transaction_id, hash, previous_block_hash FROM blockchain_data;
SELECT * FROM drug_prescriptions ORDER BY prescribed_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM drug_prescriptions WHERE dosage > 100 ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, address, contact_number FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 12345;

SELECT drug_name, prescribed_date, dosage, pharmacy_name, location FROM drug_prescriptions JOIN drug_transactions ON drug_prescriptions.prescription_id = drug_transactions.prescription_id JOIN pharmacies ON drug_transactions.pharmacy_id = pharmacies.pharmacy_id ORDER BY prescribed_date ASC, transaction_date DESC;

SELECT patient_name, drug_name, prescribed_date, quantity FROM patients JOIN drug_prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = drug_prescriptions.patient_id JOIN drug_transactions ON drug_prescriptions.prescription_id = drug_transactions.prescription_id WHERE drug_name LIKE 'Aspirin%' ORDER BY prescribed_date DESC, transaction_date ASC;
